output.sentences: Our town's carnival is quite small, but that doesn't mean you can't have fun, though you do have to make it yourself.
There are, for instance, lots of hilarious painted signs with places to insert a face for a photo op.
You can pretend to Holmes and Watson, or Helga the Viking, or a pair of bountifully busty, siamese twin ladies.
Even if you don't want to put your head into the hole, you can interact with the scene.
You can be a gentleman, naughty, whimsical, or melancholy.
